procedure.name: ScanRecord
procedure.statement: SELECT * FROM USERTABLE WHERE YCSB_KEY > ? AND YCSB_KEY < ? ALLOW FILTERING

procedure.name: InsertRecord
procedure.statement: INSERT INTO USERTABLE (YCSB_KEY, FIELD1, FIELD2, FIELD3, FIELD4, FIELD5, FIELD6, FIELD7, FIELD8, FIELD9, FIELD10) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
